price: 17.Qhiyaamah ayró Yalli koros kee usun Yallak kalah aqbaduk sugeenim gaaboysah, tokkel usun Yallak kalah aqbaduk sugecnimik A-yi-naqoosa cakki gitak maktem siini innaa, hinnay usun gitak sinnih hoxeenii keenik iyya.
arabic: وَيَوۡمَ يَحۡشُرُهُمۡ وَمَا يَعۡبُدُونَ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ فَيَقُولُ ءَأَنتُمۡ أَضۡلَلۡتُمۡ عِبَادِي هَٰٓؤُلَآءِ أَمۡ هُمۡ ضَلُّواْ ٱلسَّبِيلَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.
